description: Wrapped Bitcoin is a tokenized version of Bitcoin (BTC) that runs on the Ethereum blockchain. The Wrapped Tokens project, of which WBTC is a part, was founded as a joint project of three organizations: BitGo, Kyber Network and Ren. BitGo also serves as the entity that holds WBTC tokens and the keys needed to mint more of them. WBTC is backed by Bitcoin at a 1:1 ratio via a network of automatically monitored merchants and custodians.

en.description: Wrapped Bitcoin is a tokenized version of Bitcoin (BTC) that runs on the Ethereum blockchain. fr.description: Wrapped Bitcoin is a tokenized version of Bitcoin (BTC) that runs on the Ethereum blockchain. The Wrapped Tokens project, of which WBTC is a part, was founded as a joint project of three organizations: BitGo, Kyber Network and Ren. BitGo also serves as the entity that holds WBTC tokens and the keys needed to mint more of them. WBTC is backed by Bitcoin at a 1:1 ratio via a network of automatically monitored merchants and custodians.

es.description: Wrapped Bitcoin es una versión tokenizada de Bitcoin (BTC) que se ejecuta en la cadena de bloques Ethereum. El proyecto Wrapped Tokens, del cual forma parte WBTC, se fundó como un proyecto conjunto de tres organizaciones: BitGo, Kyber Network y Ren. BitGo también sirve como la entidad que posee tokens WBTC y las claves necesarias para acuñar más de ellos. WBTC está respaldado por Bitcoin en una proporción de 1:1 a través de una red de comerciantes y custodios monitoreados automáticamente.

zh.description: WBTC 是以太坊网络上的代币化 BTC。WBTC 是封装类代币，由 BitGo，Kyber Network 和 Ren 三家联合发行。BitGo 也充当持有 WBTC 代币的实体并拥有铸造更多代币所需的私鑰。WBTC 由 BTC 按 1:1 的比例做资产支持，通过网络可以自动监控其购买或托管状况。
